message: UI Design follows 8-state phase machine: PENDING→ACTIVE→AWAITING_REVIEW→UNDER_REVIEW→APPROVED/REJECTED/ESCALATED→REVISING. Each state has distinct color coding for immediate visual recognition
Created comprehensive 3-view dashboard design: Main Dashboard (task overview), Task Detail (phase timeline + agents), Agent Detail (logs + control). Uses dark theme with real-time WebSocket updates

views: Main Dashboard View - Task cards with phase progress
Task Detail View - Phase timeline and agent management
Agent Detail View - Live logs and tmux controls
key_features: Progressive disclosure from overview to details
